# Dangerous Gunpowder for fabric

![Available for](https://cf.way2muchnoise.eu/versions/dangerous_gunpowder_fabric_all.svg)
[![CurseForge all releases](https://cf.way2muchnoise.eu/dangerous_gunpowder_fabric.svg)](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/hotbar-randomizer-fabric/files)
[![Modrinth all releases](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=5da545&label=modrinth&prefix=downloads%20&query=downloads&url=https://api.modrinth.com/api/v1/mod/Kh9D0uks&style=flat&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://modrinth.com/mod/dangerous_gunpowder_fabric/versions)
[![GitHub all releases](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/esWhistler/DangerousGunpowderFabric/total)](https://github.com/esWhistler/DangerousGunpowderFabric/releases)
[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/github/license/esWhistler/DangerousGunpowderFabric)](https://github.com/esWhistler/DangerousGunpowderFabric/blob/1.18/LICENSE)
[![GitHub release (latest SemVer including pre-releases)](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/esWhistler/DangerousGupowderFabric?include_prereleases)](https://github.com/esWhistler/DangerousGunpowderFabric/releases)

Have you tried to put gunpowder in a furnace expecting it to explode and got disappointed by it not exploding?

I know I did!

A small amount of gunpowder probably won't make that big an explosion, just burn your remaining fuel. But if you happen to put a whole stack there...

<sub><sup>this mod has absolutely not been properly tested.</sup></sub>
